Html:
Hi,

This occurred to me using the tree model, but I suppose it's a general case: when a non-unique trinket or ring is marked as available and best of class, the optimizer equips two of them, one in each slot.

This is a problem when we have only one available (arguingly, the most common case).

The problem is small, because as we climb the gear ladder, items become unique. In the meantime, we can edit the gear set manually.
Right click on item, select edit item and mark it as unique. That will force optimizer to only use it once.
